snippet: Yelling “jail killer cops” and demanding to meet with Mayor Richard J. Berry of Albuquerque, more than two dozen demonstrators stormed his office on Monday.
abstract: Police in Albuquerque arrest more than two dozen demonstrators who stormed Mayor Richard J Berry's office, demanding to meet with him; protest is latest to rock the city because of anger over recent police shootings.
lead_paragraph: Yelling “jail killer cops” and demanding to meet with Mayor Richard J. Berry of Albuquerque, more than two dozen demonstrators stormed his office on Monday.

headline.main: New Mexico: Protesters Arrested in Mayor’s Office
headline.print_headline: New Mexico: Protesters Arrested in Mayor’s Office
